GED'OOo

GED stands for Gestion Electronique de Documents in french, i.e. Electronic Document Managment

Welcome on the GED'OOo's demonstration page


To use this demonstrator, you need on your workstation:
  • A template in .ott format (Open Template Text), designed according to the GED'OOo documentation
  • an XML file containing the data to be inserted into the document.

If you don't have such a template, nor an XML file, you can download here an archive containing some examples.
